Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This place was once a stable. And I was
once its owner.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But when that terrible cold wave rolled in,
it froze up our business along with the
rest of Hebra.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Which is why the stable closed down...
and the <clr:0000>Lucky Clover Gazette <clr:ffff>bought out
the place shortly after.
I thought I'd try to help out around here
for a while. It's not like I have anywhere
else to go.
But it's a lot of work I'm not used to, and
I'm still sort of fumbling through learning
it all.
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You can always get cozy by a bonfire, <sp:5:0:0>but
at the end of the day, nothing beats
settling down with a roof over your head.
Now that <clr:0000>we can go into the archives<clr:ffff>,
I get the feeling I'll be sleeping a lot
more soundly from now on!
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Perhaps due to the abnormal weather,
there's been an explosive increase in
Hylian pine cones.
They're oily on the inside and burn
really well.

Too well, in fact. I tossed one onto the
fire for kindling, and the force with which
it burned whipped up a <clr:0000>whirlwind<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Which in turn sent all of the freshly
printed newspapers flying far, far away...
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you find a <clr:0000>Hylian pine cone <clr:ffff>of your own,
whatever you do, don't <clr:0000>throw it in a fire<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We're through the worst of that terrible
weather now, but it brought something
interesting with it...
An explosive increase in <clr:0000>Hylian
pine cones<clr:ffff>!

Those pine cones are very oily on the
inside and burn something fierce.

I learned that the hard way by tossing
one onto the fire. It burst into flame so
ferociously, it whipped up a <clr:0000>whirlwind<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Which ended up taking all of the freshly
printed newspapers with it...
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm just the odd job guy around here, so
if you have any <clr:0000>Gazette <clr:ffff>business, you'll
want to talk to someone else. Sorry.
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I just do odd jobs around the place, so if
you have any <clr:0000>Gazette<clr:ffff> business to take
care of, please ask someone inside.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're going to want to talk to somebody
inside if you have any business with the
<clr:0000>Lucky Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I should go collect more <clr:0000>wood <clr:ffff>soon.


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I tried using a <clr:0000>Hylian pine cone<clr:ffff> to fuel a
fire a while back, and I got more than I
bargained for.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Guess it's time to collect some <clr:0000>wood<clr:ffff>...


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>No kindling shortcuts. My <clr:0000>Hylian pine
cone <clr:ffff>mishap taught me that. Gotta do the
work and chop down the trees.<sp:5:1:0> Hm?
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welcome to Rito Sta...<sp:5:1:0> *sigh* Welcome to
the <clr:0000>Lucky Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Sorry. Old habits die hard. This isn't
Rito Stable anymore...
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think><sp:0:2:2:5000>I still can't believe one <clr:0000>Hylian pine cone<clr:ffff> could burn
so intensely.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What did I tell you about burning
Hylian pine cones?!

<sp:3:0:2:0300>You have to be careful with those things.
Especially when there are others nearby!
<sp:5:1:0>Good grief...
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, welcome. <sp:5:0:0>This is Rito Stable.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>No, it's not. It's the <clr:0000>Lucky Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry. Old habits die hard.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Harder than stables do, clearly...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0701>Ahem. I just do odd jobs, so if you have
business with the <clr:0000>Lucky Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>,
please ask somebody inside.
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>Excuse me, sir! Did I just see you burn a
Hylian pine cone?!

<sp:3:0:2:0300>You have to be careful with those things.
Especially when there are others nearby!
<sp:5:1:0>Good grief...
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This place was once a stable. And I was
once its owner.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But when that terrible cold wave rolled in,
it froze up our business along with the
rest of Hebra.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Which is why the stable is closed and the
<clr:0000>Lucky Clover Gazette <clr:ffff>has bought out the
old space.
I don't have anywhere else to go, so I
thought I'd try to help out around here.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Not that I'm much good at it. I just
learned the terrifying way what happens
when you burn a <clr:0000>Hylian pine cone<clr:ffff>...
Talk_0017:
<snd:Sleep>I didn't mean it... <sp:5:0:0>I'll never toss another
pine cone in a fire again, honest...
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>By the by, how may I help you? <sp:5:0:0>This is
Rito Stable.<sp:5:1:0>

No, it's not. It's the <clr:0000>Lucky Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
Sorry... Old habits die hard.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I just do odd jobs here, so if you have
business with the <clr:0000>Lucky Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>,
you should talk to somebody inside.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Perhaps due to the abnormal weather,
there's been an explosive increase in
Hylian pine cones.
They're very oily on the inside and burn
really well.

Too well, in fact. I tried tossing one onto
the fire for kindling, and it went up so
violently, it created a <clr:0000>whirlwind<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Which in turn sent all of the freshly
printed newspapers flying far, far away...

I'm supposed to be helping the <clr:0000>Lucky
Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>, and that was very much
the opposite of help.
